amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the training assignments are aimed at the management of complex technical projects; requires that small business concerns be represented in the training assignments; prohibits private sector participant organizations from charging employee costs to Federal contracts; and requires a report from the Office of Personnel Management on the information technology training programs available to Federal employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to insert clarifying provisions and to add reporting requirements to the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
